name: Drop-in: Cozy Rides
description: Lets ride, make new friends and socialize while riding around obstacles. Cozy Coupes, Little Tikes, Push and Rides are provided.

howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
